channel.title: Game Dev on It's Nothing
channel.description: Recent content in Game Dev on It's Nothing

item.title: Revisiting old unity projects
item.description: I have a bunch of old Unity projects lying around, mostly from gamejams. Instant learning, just looking at the menu for our 2016 Ludum Dare Game “Potion Shift”: Don’t be too ambitious with announcing features/content, especially don’t put them in your main menu: Coming, Coming Soon… I don’t think so :P From now on I’ll just put things in blogposts that I can silently delete later to undo any unfulfilled announcements ;)
